content:
From: Walther Neuper <wneuper@ist.tugraz.at>
The same error message occurs after deletion of "~/.isabelle" and
re-build of Isabelle2013-2.

Walther

From: Walther Neuper <wneuper@ist.tugraz.at>
sorry for the noise: with the right paths both, Isabelle2013-2 and
Isabelle2014, work fine in parallel
